plain: Based on the user's favorite movies, it can be inferred that their favorite genre is crime/drama/thriller. They seem to prefer complex, twist-filled plots with well-developed characters. Their favorite musical score is likely to be dark, atmospheric, and fitting to the mood and setting of the film. They enjoy a variety of settings, from urban to rural, and prefer a realistic, gritty visual style. Their favorite writing style is likely to be detailed, with well-crafted dialogue. Runtime preferences are unknown, but themes of crime, justice, and human nature are likely to be among their favorites.
